p: To evaluate pathogenicity of the viruses, 5 female BALB/c AnNHsd mice (6–7 weeks old) were infected intranasally with different doses (10 6−10 2) of each of the recombinant influenza viruses described here, or were mock-infected. The animals were monitored daily for clinical signs and body weights for two weeks. For ethical reasons, mice were euthanized when they presented 25% body weight loss.
